name: Flint Hills Group
tagline: US Experts Providing Innovative Software Solutions
description:
Technology is accelerating and companies increasingly can’t staff to keep up. Flint Hills Group builds solutions so companies can thrive and become leaders in their industry. Don't stand still and get left behind!
Flint Hills Group is a team of over 35 US-based software engineers. The average experience level of our engineers is 20 years with capabilities spanning mobile apps, artificial intelligence, blockchain, IoT, database design, embedded firmware, graphical user interface design, technical publications and project management. We build complex in-demand systems hosted in the cloud as SaaS. We are capable of tackling Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain projects as well. We work remotely from our US offices in your time zone to provide expertise at a great value. We use Agile and Scrum software methodologies which involve the customer every step of the way. You'll love our collaboration and partnership to get your products to market quickly!
READ MORE...
